name: Switch World
description:
You are now trapped between 2 dimensions because of a virus in one of your invention, you need to reach the end of your crazy labo to maybe find the antivirus that will solve the problem ! Can you find the antivirus in the labo full of trap ?

Controls :

WASD - Move

E - Switch Dimension

SPACEBAR - Interact with switch

Q - Set Respawn

Made for the  GeoJam 2021 By :

BlueOctopus (Art, Programmation)

RudraDev (Level Design and Game Design)

 Saad Memon (SFX, Music)
